input.description:
String Value - The change ID
Remedy Example: CRQ000000000201
HP ServiceCenter Example: C23
BMC_Remedyforce Example:CR00000055

String Value - The new status
BMC_AR_System
Valid Values:
Draft Request For Authorization Request For Change Planning In Progress Scheduled For Review Scheduled For Approval Scheduled Implementation In Progress Pending Rejected Completed Cancelled
HP_ServiceCenter
Valid Values:
Initial Pending Closed
BMC_Remedyforce Valid Values:
Accepted Active Analyzed Approved Archived Assigned Broken Down Closed /No contact Completed Closed Cancelled Development Disabled Discontinued Draft failed In Progress In Stock Installed Known Error Lost or Stolen Maintenance No Resolution Off Line On Loan Waiting for

output.description:
String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure

xpath-expression.xpath: string(.)='create remediation job in progress modified'

input.value: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy
EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss z yyyy

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job completed Successfully'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job Failed'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Failed</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job Canceled'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Cancelled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job Aborted'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Cancelled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job Deleted'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Cancelled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Job Schedule Expired'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Cancelled</xsl:text> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss zzz yyyy
EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss zzz yyyy

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="location" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string-length(//Task) > 0"> <xsl:copy-of select="//Task" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>${task}</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </Tasks> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
